data.title: Jupiter Massage & Pilates Excellent Experience
data.text: Terrific studio staffed with extremely professional, knowledgeable and talented staff.  Equipped to train those who are beginners to Pilates to those who are advanced.  Would highly recommend Jupiter Massage & Pilates.  Michael D.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Front Office Manager at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for the review. We are thrilled that you enjoyed your experience with us. Hope to see you soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The pilates 1 hour workout in the morning  makes me feel fantastic for the rest of my day
data.text:
This pilates studio is warm and inviting, very clean and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The instructors are so nice and professional and make my 1 hour class each time I go more exciting, I love the reformer and the cool down stretch at the end of each class, it's so relaxing for your muscles to be able to stretch out any tension and soreness, my knees and hips feel so much better. I look more streamline. And gives me a much more positive outlook on myself, I wish I new the benefits of pilates a long time ago. It has help me with my horseback riding making me more comfortable and much more aware of my alignment & straightness in my body helping me and my horses to harmoniously work better together. I can also hike longer with my dog Winni like I use to when we're visiting our home up north in the mountains and she's very happy about that. I even bought a yoga mat for traveling so I can still do my stretches. 
I haven't tried the massages yet, but have heard nothing but great reviews, that's next on my list.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Front Office Manager at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you very much for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review. We love training you back in the Pilates studio and can't wait to see you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best place for massage
data.text:
The rooms are very comfortable and clean. The all team is very friendly, professional and welcoming.
Courtney and Jennifer give the best massage and know how to find the places where you need it the most.
Highly recommended.

data.title: Massage and Pilates 10 minutes away!
data.text: Never been into a "gym" atmosphere, however, I knew It was time to sat art taking care of the 50+ body. I received a free Pilates session AND 1hr massage as a gift and am not looking back. The facility is clean and the staff...fun and friendly! They are also very knowledgeable and have assisted with recent injuries I acquired in a klutzy fall! I also see and feel results immediately. Stress relieving, peaceful and strength inducing!!! Love it!

data.title: Better than we could have imagined
data.text: We decided to get a couples massage during our 25th wedding anniversary trip to Jupiter. Fantastic from start to finish! Appointment was easy to make, place was clean and welcoming, staff was friendly and professional. Jen and Courtney gave us each a fantastic massage with special attention to our problem areas. They even surprised us with an anniversary card and gift! How special is that?!? Highly recommend!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Front Office Manager at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review! We're happy to hear your couples massage was fantastic and that we were able to help make your 25th wedding anniversary special! We hope to see you guys again on your next trip to Jupiter.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best massage....EVER!
data.text:
There's a reason this place has excellent reviews....it is phenomenal.   Best massage I've ever had.  Jennifer is a master.  Full 60 minute massage with yummy peppermint oils.  It was blissful.
While waiting, John the owner, welcomed us and gave great tips on where to eat, visit, while in town.
Great atmosphere.   Very clean and modern with friendly professional staff. 

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Front Office Manager at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for your very kind review. We are so glad you enjoyed your experience here and we hope to see you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Reformer session
data.text: I had a personal 1:1 session with the owner John who was awesome!  The whole ambience at the place is soooo relaxed and peaceful.  My family had massages which they all really enjoyed whilst I had my training session on the Pilates reformer beds.  John was really good and very helpful.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Front Office Manager at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your review! I'm glad you & your family enjoyed the massages along with the pilates. We hope to see you again when you return!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Truly professional massage!
data.text: This is now my go to place for Massage therapy. It's very clean and comfortable,  and the staff is very friendly. The massages are consistently the best I've had.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Front Office Manager at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you Robert for taking the time to review our establishment. We're glad you were pleased with your massages. We hope to see you again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Pilates on my Time
data.text: I love that I can go in the mornings when it is convenient for me and still have someone there to give support and guidance through my workout.  I find the studio to be exceptionally clean, tidy and organized.  The staff is knowledgable, attentive and very friendly.  A bonus is having a massage after a workout in one of their six massage rooms which are serene, quiet and very relaxing.  I highly recommend Jupiter Massage & Pilates!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We want to thank you for your wonderful review, we strive to give all of our clients a 100% positive experience! We are very glad that it has fit to your schedule and you enjoy the studio. We hope to see you in the near future.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: This place is fantastic!
data.text: I had suffered from Plantar Fasciitis for years and after three months going here two to three times a week, it was gone.  And has not come back!  I wish I would have found this place years ago!  The staff is well educated, professional and very friendly.   I have tried other Pilate places and there is no comparison!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so happy that you had such a positive experience with us! We strive to give each of our guests, those who are new to us as well as return clients, a unique routine curtailed to each clients specific needs. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Just the Best Place to Go
data.text:
Great location, friendly staff, pilates instructors are excellent and awesome massages by experienced masseuses.
Just the best place to be!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your experience with us and left satisfied. We would love to see you again!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: This Spot hits the Spot
data.text: Super friendly staff, open hours that competitors are not, warm and inviting and each time I go I get the massage I need for that particular day. Other places I've been in Jupiter it's cookie cutter- Here they really cater to your needs.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our establishment. We're glad you were pleased with your time here. Glad that we could customize the massage to your needs, hope to see you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: the best of the best
data.text: what a great place keep fit with the Pilates machines and stay limber with a truly great massage. all are eager to help and you. Always feel welcomed been a customer for 10 years and would not go any where else. The owners John and Tiffani will make sure that your visit is the greatest experience possible

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for being a loyal customer for 10 years. We look forward to serving you more in the future. We're glad you have been enjoying your expierence here.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great couples massage!
data.text: This place was great! Really nice owner and nice employees. It was such a better value than to drop triple the money at a resort for the same great massage, and he even gave us a first time discount which was nice and unexpected.  They also include hot stones in the price which was really unexpected and nice.  I've never had a hot stone massage before so that was really appreciated and totally wonderful.  I would recommend this place and will for sure visit again.  Try it and you won't be disappointed!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We are so happy that you had such a positive experience with us! We strive to give each of our guests, those who are new to us as well as return clients, an exceptional massage and top quality care every time you visit us. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Awesome Massage!
data.text: Wonderful massage experience!  Owners Tiffany & John & all the massage therapists are so professional and nice.  Tiffany & John did such a nice job on their tropical decor. Their massages are the best especially the hot rocks!  You come out feeling so relaxed.  I highly recommend Jupiter Massage & Pilates.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for your thoughtful review.  Every one of us strives to make each visit a completely relaxing and rejuvenating one for our clients, so it makes us very happy to hear that you had such a positive experience here! We are also pleased to hear that you liked our tropical decor.  We definitely had fun designing the space and have really worked hard to create a comfortable atmosphere that also reflects our beautiful Florida locale. Please visit us again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: VERY RELAXING AND WORTH THE COIN
data.text: All the staff were courteous and professional....The massage was 5 Star...Centrally located and easy to get to.The hot stones and towels were a nice touch. Thanks again...Ian

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our establishment. We're very pleased that you were happy with your visit here. We always strive to create the most relaxing and valuable experience for our guests, and we look forward to working with you again next time you are in the area!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great massage
data.text: My husband and I booked a couples massage for our anniversary while in Jupiter. Our expierence was a nice, relaxing massage - Courtney was proffesional and I enjoyed the massage.  This is the FIRST place I've been to that does NOT charge extra for aromatherapy or the hot stones...truly amazing experience...so much that we will drive from Wellington to come here for future massages.  If you're looking for a massage in a professional establishment with people that truly care, don't hesitate to book a massage here.

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We appreciate the kind words; thank you so much for taking the time to review us! We feel honored to help make your anniversary weekend special. We truly do care about our guests and we’re very pleased to be able to provide the complete massage experience that makes our establishment stand out. Please visit again soon!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: The best ever massage!!!!!
data.text: Tired of the run-oft-the-mill massage studios where all you are is another body to be massaged in 60 minutes.  We'll,Not at Jupiter Massage and Pilates. A well established couple, John and Tiffany provide first class service to all their clients be iT Pilates or massage. I treat myself regularly to a massage and feel like a completely relaxed new person. The tropical atmosphere and the choice of music is incredible. Their staff is comprised of high quality personnel who ensure you will not be disappointed. The Chinese cupping, hot stones, and aromatherapy are a plus. Treat yourself today. You will not be disappointed!!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us such a great review. We are glad to hear you felt more relaxed after your expierence here. Everybody here at Jupiter Massage and Pilates tries to give 110% to make each and every clients expierence here enjoyable.Thank you again for the kind words, we hope to see you soon.
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: High Quality Service
data.text:
My husband and I treated ourselves to massages here last month while on vacation in Jupiter.  I had Monique and he had Megan.  Both were wonderful and relaxing.  A few things that set them apart from other spas: the hot stone option was included - not an extra charge (I hate feeling nickled and dimed for every option so this was a nice surprise) and they use cream from a jar not lotion - so there was no tapping of the bottle to get more lotion every few minutes which interrupts the 'zen' of it all. 
We would definitely visit again for the same high-quality experience!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: We feel honored that we could be a part of your vacation plans! Thank you for taking the time to visit us and to write a lovely review. We take pride in being able to give our clients the massage that they need rather than up-selling them on each additional treatment.  It is a joy to be able to include hot stones and high quality massage cream and all of the tools and techniques at our disposal at no extra charge to you. To us, offering the very best massage we can give comes naturally. We hope you'll visit us again next time you're in the area!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: I've been coming here for years and I can't say enough good things .
data.text: You walk into John &Tiffani's new location and its beautiful .....The atmosphere is inviting and the rooms are tranquil,peaceful, and clean....I usually have Tiffanni but sometimes  I can't arrange that with my schedule  so I think at one time or another Iv'e had them all,Their staff is by far the best .....Sometimes I need deep tissue massage and other times I feel like just a relaxing massage no matter what I want they can do it ......I'm a happy woman when I leave .....definitely get the hot rocks its a Must....I'm so glad I found them years ago (on a recommendation of my Doctor ) we have a great relationship  as you can tell I'm hooked!!!!!!

owner_response.author: Johnny-Pilates, Owner at Jupiter Massage & Pilates, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to review our establishment. We're very pleased that you were happy with your visit here. We always strive to create the most relaxing and valuable experience for our guests, and we look forward to working with you again next time you are in the area!
owner_response.title: Owner Response
